New Records: Denmark achieved a 14th win in 16 games at home
Key Match Events: Christian Eriksen scored and assisted a goal for Denmark
Christian Eriksen scored the winner for Denmark in the dying moments
Pre-Game Insights: Denmark were brimming with confidence and had 13 wins from their previous 15 at home
Post-Match Reflections: Denmark will hope to add another morale-boosting victory before the Euros as they host Norway on Saturday
Sweden's summer ends after their game at home to Serbia
Miscellaneous Highlights: Christian Eriksen was awarded the Flashscore Man of the Match award
Others: The match was a pulsating 2-1 win for Denmark against Sweden
Rasmus Hojlund burst into life after the break and came within inches of putting the hosts back in front
